hero.heading: Experience sustainable luxury amidst Bali’s lush jungle.
hero.description: Nestled among rice fields and coconut trees in Tabanan, only 20 minutes from Canggu.

villas.name: Floating Lake
villas.tagline: A luxurious floating villa on our bio-filtered lake.

villas.name: Grand Lagoon Private Pool
villas.tagline: Exclusive riverside villa with jungle lagoon view.

reviews.name: Alsana Trawally
reviews.quoteBody: Best experience I had in Bali... customer service was impeccable and the staff were so kind. It's unbelievable that everything is made of bamboo.

reviews.name: Anne & Steve
reviews.quoteTitle: If I Only Could Give 6 Stars.
reviews.quoteBody: This is definitely one of the best resorts we’ve ever been at... the extraordinary architecture surrounds you the moment you walk inside.

locationBlurb.heading: Tucked Within Majestic Balinese Nature.
locationBlurb.text: Strategically located near popular areas like Canggu and Ubud — peaceful, lush, and full of things to do.
